title: Abdulla Abatsiyev
text:
Abdulla Alxazoviç Abatsiyev (, 16 August 1993) is an Azerbaijani <a href="Association%20football">football</a> <a href="midfielder">midfielder</a> and junior coach. He also holds <a href="Russia">Russia</a>n citizenship.
Club career.
Abatsiyev signed with <a href="FC%20Torpedo%20Armavir">FC Torpedo Armavir</a> on 26 February 2016.
International career.
Abatsiyev played his first international game with the national team on 27 May 2014, in a friendly in and against <a href="United%20States%20men%27s%20national%20soccer%20team">United States</a> where he was named in the starting line-up and played 71 minutes.
